subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Thomas Müller scored two goals, and host Bayern Munich dominated from start to finish to beat Arsenal, 5-1, and close in on a place in the knockout stage of the Champions League.
snippet: Thomas Müller scored two goals, and host Bayern Munich dominated from start to finish to beat Arsenal, 5-1, and close in on a place in the knockout stage of the Champions League.
